ai-tha-ap126:1.4_0: one dispelling all kinds of darkness.
ai-tha-ap126:2.1_0: who are impressive in the palace,
ai-tha-ap126:2.2_0: if he is going to the end of the world.
ai-tha-ap126:2.4_0: are just like one who shows their mother.
ai-tha-ap126:3.1_0: They rejoice in the scent of flowers,
ai-tha-ap126:3.4_0: with the passing away I have died there,
ai-tha-ap126:4.2_0: to the odor of the fragrance
ai-tha-ap126:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap126:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Gandhāradvāja.
ai-tha-ap126:8.1_0: to the Elder Gandhamādana, the fourth Elder Nun
